column2:
"Hey, partner! Still hard at work? I've got to be
honest, I'm feeling a little burnt out, myself."

"Official missions can get pretty boring when
you're on your own. Not to mention my own
personal search."

"That, and it sure is a lot safer out there with
somebody else to watch your back, isn't it?"

"I'm not about to drag anybody else into my
personal stuff, though, so I guess I'd better
just suck it up."

"That said, if the timing ever works out, it'd be
great to work together again sometime.
Anyway, take it easy!"

"よー、相棒！
きびきび働いてっかー？
おれはなんだか飽きてきたぜ。"

"任務にしろ、個人的な調査にしろ
一人でってのは飽きるもんだな。"

"誰かと一緒に動いた方が
安心感も違うし、いいよなぁ。"

"まー、おれの個人的な調査は
他人を巻き込んでするようなもんでも
ないから、仕方ないけどさ。"

"今度タイミングが合ったら
一緒に一仕事しようぜ。
んじゃな。"
